Class TemplateLayoutRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotmarketing.portlets.templates.design.bean.TemplateLayoutRow

  • public class TemplateLayoutRow
extends java.lang.Object
    Bean that represent a single HTML select/option when we try to edit a drawed template.
    Author:
    Graziano Aliberti - Engineering Ingegneria Informatica
